# MTLDispatchType.serial

**Case**

Sets a command encoder to dispatch encoded commands serially during your pass.

## Declaration

```swift
case serial
```

## Execution dispatch types

- **MTLDispatchType.concurrent**: Sets a command encoder to dispatch encoded commands concurrently during your pass.
